originalText.text: This doctor saved my lifeüéâI had a serious injury after a car accident that left me with vomiting and a lot of food not digesting properly due to the esophagus ring being partially opened. After going to so many hospitals and getting the wrong test done Doctor A. was my last attempt. I prayed and I found him and he knew exactly what test to perform I had never heard of it being a former surgical technologist I didnt know everything. Well he found the problem right away and he fixed the problem using robotic surgery in which was less pain and less down time. It‚Äôs now after 8 weeks I am off of liquids healed and no medication. originalText.text: I recently got surgery by Dr. Krikhely and he's amazing. He was informative, he made me feel very comfortable from my first pre-op appointment to my most recent post-op appointment. His staff is welcomig and friendly. Dr. Krikhely saved my life with this surgery and will forever be a huge part of my weight loss journey. I highly recommend him for baritric surgery!

text.text: I recently got surgery by Dr. Krikhely and he's amazing. He was informative, he made me feel very comfortable from my first pre-op appointment to my most recent post-op appointment. His staff is welcomig and friendly. Dr. Krikhely saved my life with this surgery and will forever be a huge part of my weight loss journey. I highly recommend him for baritric surgery!

originalText.text: I recently had hernia surgery performed by Dr. Krikhely. I want to recommend his services enthusiastically. The surgery went well but i was most impressed with the genuine concern Dr. Krikhely had for me as a patient. He prepared me thoroughly and met with me shortly after the surgery and then again six months later. At both meetings, he had all the time I wanted to discuss my concerns. In fact, at the second meeting, he even raised issues that I brought up at the first meeting and that I had long since forgotten. This is a terrific doctor.

originalText.text: Dr. Krikhely is one of the best doctors. I am very happy that he was in charge of the procedures. In my case, the procedures were delicate and I felt reassured with his professional expertise and work. After the procedure, he was very patient with me. He explained every one of my questions. He explained the different possibilities for a case like mine before surgery. All went well and may I say that I am healing nicely. I highly  recommend Dr. Krikhely. I appreciate your work and experience.

originalText.text:
Dr. Krikhely was friendly and answered all of my questions. He was thorough, calm, and, unlike other doctors, I didn‚Äôt feel rushed when meeting with him. His staff was so accommodating also.
He performed my surgery without flaw. I am very happy with him and his staff, and I would highly recommend him to everyone.
